entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • When resizing the application window in Windows, if the resizing is done horizontally then elements within the window will resize correctly, but if resizing is done only vertically then resizing does not occur. #23641
  • [iOS] Image on Button doesn't properly centered when setting ContentLayout to Top and text has 2 or more lines. #23635
  • WebAuthenticator custom headers for http client #23633
  • [iOS] Shadow not visible in Button When using Clipping #23630
  • Drag & Drop using GestureRecognizers fails on Mac Catalyst #23627
  • Flyoutpage -disappeared pages are still in the Managed Memory window. #23625
  • SemanticProperties do not work on ToolbarItems #23623
  • WebAuthenticator freezes in case when system kills app process #23622
  • 'OnPropertyChanged("Item") ' invalid in 'Release' mode #23621
  • [iOS] Border`s Render was not correctly in CollectionView #23620
  • Shared projects are not visible in .NET MAUI Multi-Project App. #23619

Closed

  • CarouselView - iOS - Changing Position no longer works after navigation away then coming back #23291
    .NET 8 SR8
  • Previously selected Shellitem cannot be reselected #20273
    Backlog
  • maui workload 8.0.61/8.0.100 introduced NativeAOT runtime error in EFC .net 8 #23595
  • SearchBar: Inconsistent behavior - Confusion and request to reopen issue 9092 #23588
  • Android crashes on Modal Animation when backgrounded #23399
    .NET 8 SR8
  • SwipeItem.IconImageSource.FontImageSource color value not honored when SwipeItem Background color os set. #23581
  • Button HeightRequest value not applying lesser than default value #18999
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Add embedding sample and code #23642
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 #23639
    area-infrastructure
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #23638
    area-infrastructure
  • Re-enable GetServiceOrCreateInstance with Shell #23632
  • [net8.0] Try iOS with new Sonoma and Xcode 15.4 #23629
  • [Windows] Handle non-seekable streams in `PlatformImage.FromStream` #23626
    community ✨

Merged

  • [Core] Enforce CA1507 - use nameof() where possible #21962
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-architecture, community ✨
  • [CI] Bump xcode 15.4.0 #22611
    area-infrastructure
  • [iOS] CarouselView: Changing Position after navigation away then comi… #23477
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, migration-compatibility
  • Revert "[darc] Pin darc version as workaround (#23584)" #23636
    area-infrastructure
  • [Android] Honor IconImageSource.FontImageSource color #23604
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-swipeview
  • Fix menus to only create casting list once #23618

Updated

  • Hide FlyoutIcon when FlyoutBehavior set to disabled #20087
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Add empty (no sample content) option for Blazor Hybrid #23615
    area-blazor, area-templates
  • HybridWebView control for integrating JS/HTML/CSS easily into a .NET MAUI app #22880
    area-controls-hybridwebview, 9.0-preview7
  • NavigationBarColors from NavigationPage not changing on AppTheme changin - fix #23343
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-toolbar
  • [iOS] Setting background color on the Searchbar - fix #23355
    community ✨
  • Use DialogFragment for Android modals #22869
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-dialogalert
  • [Windows] Fix pull to refresh w/ horz item layouts #23547
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-general
  • Android ecosystem updates based on net9.0 branch #23271
    area-infrastructure
  • Implemented ios:Slider.UpdateOnTap #20124
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-slider
  • [Windows] Add TitleBar Control #23019
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-window, .NET 9 Planning
  • [X] do not apply Bindings if DataType doesnt match #22056
    area-xaml
  • Changed order of calls to properly close MediaPicker Activity / ViewController and set the picker result #21998
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-essentials, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22927
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
